trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl"></xref> class is used to pass flags to the server to control search behavior.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl.#ctor"></xref> constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl"></xref> class.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOption)"></xref> constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl"></xref> class using the specified search options.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOption"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the search behavior.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl.GetValue"></xref> method returns search option for this object.
The search option associated with this control.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOptionsControl.SearchOption"></xref> property contains one of the values of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOption"></xref> enumeration that specifies the search behavior.
One of the values of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOption"></xref> enumeration that specifies the search behavior.
The value is not one of the values of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchOption"></xref>.
